name: CLOSED
description:
My first game ever made hope you like it!!

Huh where am i?

Huh where am i? 

Huh where am i? 

The way to freedom is C L O S E D. to open the gate you need to disable all the 5 beacons in this area but you are in high danger so don't get CAUGHT!!

CONTROLS:

WASD for walk.

Shift to run.

Left mouse click is interact.

Ctrl for hide!

CREDITS: i made this Game in 7 days it was a exercise  from the GDU course!

Site: https://www.gamedevunlocked.com/

FOLLOW: my Twitter for future updates and upcoming Games!
